Posts.Content: Tori, hang in there! I also had microcalcifications and went in for a follow mammo. Based on the positioning and the fact that last year they saw nothing, I had a biopsy this past Monday. Got the results in 2 days - no cancer. From experience I know it can be scary, but 80% of microcalcifications are not cancerous.
Posts.Title: Had a mammogram monday and showed microcalcifications
